title: graphics card died need new graphics card
body:
my first question is, is this going to affect my chances of getting picked for pbe? now that my graphics card has died and i dont have a replacement yet and i am playing on integrated graphics.

and my 2nd is. what do u recommend for a new EVGA graphics card.

it has to run
league
starcraft 2
and diablo 3 

at max settings league obviously being the most important

the current one that died was a 
Part Number: 01G-P3-1463-KR
Part Desc: EVGA GeForce GTX 560 Superclocked

which i had since 2012

it has to meet at least or exceed the specs of that
    336 CUDA Cores
    1GB 256-bit GDDR5
    PCI Express 2.0 x16
http://www.videocardbenchmark.net/gpu.php?gpu=GeForce+GTX+560+Ti&id=18#price

looking to spend between 150 and 225 dollars (but will consider going up to around 300 if it make a HUGE difference)

replies.body: I'm not sure that your specs plays a factor in your application, but I'm also not part of that team and don't have details on how applicants are selected beyond the [PBE FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ)  We do have a [recommended specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)page to help you find a card best fit for you.  Best of luck!
